graph_title: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services
indicator_name: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Assist developing countries in attaining long-term debt sustainability through coordinated policies aimed at fostering debt financing, debt relief and debt restructuring, as appropriate, and address the external debt of highly indebted poor countries to reduce debt distress
